message: Dr. Smith was very attentive during my appointment. She explained everything clearly and made sure I understood my treatment plan.
The waiting room was clean and comfortable. The nurse who took my vitals was friendly and efficient.
My doctor listened carefully to my concerns and offered helpful advice. However, the office seemed a bit disorganized.
Unfortunately, my appointment ran significantly behind schedule. This caused me to be late for another commitment.
I was very dissatisfied with my experience. The doctor seemed rushed and didn't address all my questions.
The staff was friendly and welcoming. However, the exam room could have been cleaner.
I appreciated the doctor's willingness to explain things in detail. The receptionist was also very helpful with scheduling.
My appointment went smoothly, but I felt like I didn't get as much time with the doctor as I needed.
The office was easy to find and park at. Unfortunately, the nurse who took my blood pressure seemed a bit inexperienced.
I was extremely satisfied with my care. The doctor was knowledgeable and addressed all my concerns thoroughly.
